name: Star Trek (2013)
description: The Games on Demand version supports English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Russian. Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual". Game players will get to play as two of the greatest science-fiction heroes ever -- Kirk and Spock – in the award-winning STAR TREK, a completely original co-op experience that expands the Star Trek universe even further. Set in the 23rd Century world of the massively popular Star Trek reboot, this cover-based shooter immerses players in a rich, original story and action-packed combat.
